Omitted Other Inconsistency.text: Blood tests showed elevated WBC, low Hgb, and Hct. Fluid cultures indicated Candida albicans. Imaging (MRCP, CT ABD) revealed multiple peripancreatic fluid collections, splenic vein occlusion, left pleural effusion, and T11 vertebral body compression fracture. ECHO showed normal left ventricular function, borderline right ventricular function, moderate mitral regurgitation, and mild pulmonary hypertension.
